eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A LOCAL AREA EMERGENCY FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Bernalillo, NM; AT 05:18 PM ON OCT 09, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 09:09 PM OCT 13, 2025. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: Severe Weather imminent. Seek shelter now at Balloon Fiesta Park, car, bus, structure.
